pr_title: Async core metrics part3: add tests to verify async core metrics for event streaming apis

timeline.message: Add functional and unit tests to verify async core metrics for event streaming operation

timeline.bodyText: Is this meant to be reporting request id header, not request id?
timeline.author: cenedhryn

replies.bodyText:
It's the header name for request Ids with different format.
Currently, we have two formats I think
x-amzn-RequestId
x-amz-request-id
replies.author: zoewangg
